title: Teemoing Shop is Literally Impossible
body:
Thanks Riot. My Teemoing shop this year contains skins from ZERO CHAMPS I OWN and three of them I HAVE NEVER PLAYED ONCE in my life.

Really glad I got such exclusive offers- every single offer costs more than the skin does by itself because I have none of the champions. Absolutely ridiculous how dense the system can be to the point where none of the offers I get are from champs I own or have played.

replies.body: Okay... They don't HAVE to give you a discount. If you don't want them, don't buy them? Like??
You don't have to reply either by that same logic. I'm just pointing out the fallacies with a system.

Sometimes the offers will be for champs you don't own, but may have similar abilities or be in roles that you already play. I recommend keeping at eye on the [Sales Page](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales) for other items you may be more interested in.

Let me know if you have any other questions.
i have an alt account that only plays twitch and only got one twitch skin. feels bad man

> Sometimes

EVERY single one is for champs I have not owned. Not a single one do I own.

What's the point of making it so champs that are similar but never exactly the champs I own? Or even play as a matter of fact?
